name: Test of failed attempt to login with the missing field

statusDetails.message:
AssertionError: Instead of an error code 400 received code 504
assert 504 == 400
 +  where 504 = <Response [504]>.status_code

description: Negative test of the endpoint "Логин курьера в системе" POST /api/v1/courier/login.Parameterized test, checks impossibility of authorization when any of the mandatory fields is missing
